Snack Recipe : Roasted Garlic Baby Potatoes Servings: 3 Duration: 40 minutes Who doesnâ€™t love potatoes ğŸ˜ Yes, I know everyone is fell in love with these beautiful potatoes. Today, I prepared an amazing recipe with baby potatoes as the main ingredient, basil, garlic and few more add ons. This snack turned out delicious ğŸ˜‹Â and can make at kids party, pool party or goes well as an evening snack ğŸŒ¿ Letâ€™s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Baby potatoes ( red and gold colored ) - 600 grams - chop into two halves
  • Olive Oil - 1/2 Tb sp
  • Garlic cloves - 3 - Peeled off - Roughly Chopped
  • Salt - 1/2 teaspoon
  • Black Pepper Powder - 1/2 teaspoon
  • Dried basil - 1 teaspoon ( you can use fresh basil as well )
  Procedure:
  • Add all ingredients in a mixing bowl except potatoes
  • Combine well and add chopped potatoes
  • Smear them with the base ( make sure each piece of potato coated with salt, garlic, basil, oil and black pepper powder)
  • Arrange them on silicon sheet lined in a tray or you can use parchment ğŸ“œÂ paper instead
  • Bake them at 400 F/ 200 C for 40 minutes and to make them crispy broil them for more 10 minutes
  • Take out the tray with hand gloves ğŸ§¤Â and serve hot with your favorite side. I chose tomato sauce to dip in ğŸ˜‹
